Hi,All:
    I am reading the source code of Heritrix1.4.3,now,I have a question:
    I found that every thread has a HttpRecorder,it help Heritrix to get the
url's context and write them into disk.
 And i found it use checkLimits() function to limit the speed of download.
    But if we use more than 1 threads to crawl,and every thread use it to
limit download speed at the same time, i think this limit action
will be failure,because more than 1 threads download the url at the same
time.and checkLimits()  can only control one thread ....
    May be my understanding is wrong?May be the download thread was the only
one at the same time?who can help me?Thank you!
